pages.title: Mushroom Mutation
pages.text: Each time a resourceshroom spreads it has a random chance to mutate.$(br)Most mutations have extra requirements, like having another mushroom as a neighbor. These requirements will always be calculated based on the target location.$(br2)Tip: The easiest way to find all mutations is by looking through EMI.
Mutagen and Stabilizer can be placed on all Tier1+ ground blocks.$(br2)Mutagen will double the chance of mutagens.$(br)Stabilizer will make it impossible for a mushroom to mutate.
